title: Drawing, "Study: Sweet Pea", early 20th century
medium: Brush and watercolor on gray-green paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 62
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Horizontal sheet depciting three clusters of sweet pea and one single blossom in strong pink with white, and bright green stems.
